mapper.select:
select a.ask_no as ask_no , a.parents_ask_no as parents_ask_no , a.ask_name as ask_name , a.ask_content as ask_content , a.answer_content as answer_content , a.register_date as register_date , a.answer_date as answer_date , a.answer_check as answer_check , a.member_no as member_no , a.answer_check as answer_check , m.member_type_no as member_type_no , m.email as email , mt.member_type as member_type
, case when answer_check = '1' then '답변완료' else '미답변' end as answer_check_name
from ask a left outer join member m on a.member_no = m.member_no left outer join member_type mt on m.member_type_no = mt.member_type_no
where 1=1
and m.member_type_no = #{memberTypeNo}
order by ask_no desc LIMIT 10

select a.ask_no as ask_no , a.parents_ask_no as parents_ask_no , a.ask_name as ask_name , a.ask_content as ask_content , a.answer_content as answer_content , a.register_date as register_date , a.answer_date as answer_date , a.answer_check as answer_check , a.member_no as member_no , m.member_type_no as member_type_no , m.email as email , mt.member_type as member_type from ask a left outer join member m on a.member_no = m.member_no left outer join member_type mt on m.member_type_no = mt.member_type_no
where (a.ask_no in (select ask_no from ask where member_no = #{memberNo}) or a.parents_ask_no in (select ask_no from ask where member_no = #{memberNo})) order by (case when a.parents_ask_no is null then a.register_date else (select register_date from ask where ask_no =a.parents_ask_no) end) , (case when parents_ask_no is null then 0 else 1 END)
select ask_no member_no, register_date, ask_name, ask_content, answer_content, answer_date, answer_check from ask where ask_no=#{no}
